statements: SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE status='Present';
SELECT student_id, date FROM attendance_records WHERE status='Absent';
SELECT date, status FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id=101 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM attendance_records;
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM attendance_records ORDER BY status ASC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records ORDER BY date DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_attendance > 5
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), date)) AS average_days_since_last_attendance FROM attendance_records
SELECT student_id, MAX(date) AS last_attendance_date FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE status = 'Present' ORDER BY student_id
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_id, date FROM attendance_records WHERE status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM behavior_logs WHERE student_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, behavior_description FROM behavior_logs WHERE student_id = 200 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE status='Present' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS num_attendance FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_attendance > 3;
SELECT ar.student_id, ar.date, bl.behavior_description FROM attendance_records ar INNER JOIN behavior_logs bl ON ar.student_id = bl.student_id ORDER BY ar.date ASC;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), date)) AS average_days_since_attendance FROM attendance_records WHERE status='Present';
SELECT ar.student_id, COUNT(*) AS num_behavior_logs FROM attendance_records ar LEFT JOIN behavior_logs bl ON ar.student_id = bl.student_id GROUP BY ar.student_id HAVING num_behavior_logs > 0;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT date, status FROM attendance_records WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) as total_attendance FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT behavior_type, description FROM behavior_logs WHERE student_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT parent_id, message FROM parent_teacher_communication WHERE teacher_id = 789 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT student_id, behavior_type FROM behavior_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, message FROM parent_teacher_communication WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_attendance > 10
SELECT * FROM attendance_records ar JOIN behavior_logs bl ON ar.student_id = bl.student_id WHERE ar.status = 'Present'
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level='10th';
SELECT student_name, behavior_description FROM students JOIN behavior_logs ON students.student_id = behavior_logs.student_id;
SELECT student_name, date, attendance_status FROM students JOIN attendance_records ON students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT student_name, communication_date, communication_content FROM students JOIN parent_teacher_communication ON students.student_id = parent_teacher_communication.student_id ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level = '10th Grade' ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 12345 AND attendance_status = 'Present' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, behavior_description FROM students s JOIN behavior_logs b ON s.student_id = b.student_id WHERE b.behavior_description LIKE '%misbehavior%' ORDER BY b.date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, communication_date, communication_content FROM parent_teacher_communication WHERE parent_id = 54321 OR teacher_id = 98765 ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance_days FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_attendance_days >= 50 ORDER BY total_attendance_days DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT teacher_id, subject FROM teachers WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT id, name, datetime FROM parent_teacher_communication ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT student_id, behavior FROM behavior_logs WHERE behavior LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT grade_level, name FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM behavior_logs WHERE behavior LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT id, name FROM teachers WHERE subject='Mathematics';
SELECT student_id, date, status FROM attendance_records WHERE date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
